parameters.dead: a numeric vector containing the number of dead flies
parameters.conc: a numeric vector of (total) selenium concentrations
parameters.type: a numeric vector indicating the form of selenium applied
parameters.total: a numeric vector containing the total number of flies

reference: The experiment is described in more details by Jeske et al. (2009).
description:
Description
Comparison of toxicity of four types of selenium by means of dose-response analysis
title: Data from toxicology experiments with selenium
format: A data frame with 25 observations on the following 4 variables.
